alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 11 at 4:32AM CDT until April 11 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CRAWFORD AND WESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 431 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Anthonies Mill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported one inch hail 6 miles south of Steelville. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anthonies Mill. This also includes Onondaga Cave State Park. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 210 and 214. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
